```{ojs}
md`# 2022 Advent of Code • Day 02 • Rock Paper Scissors`
```

```{ojs}
md`https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/2`
```

```{ojs}
md`- Rock defeats Scissors
- Scissors defeats Paper
- Paper defeats Rock`
```

```{ojs}
choice = ({
  X: 1,
  Y: 2,
  Z: 3
})
```

```{ojs}
score = ({
  "A Y": 6,
  "B Z": 6,
  "C X": 6,
  "A X": 3,
  "B Y": 3,
  "C Z": 3
})
```

```{ojs}
d3.sum(
  input0
    .split("\n")
    .map((round) => (score[round] ??= 0) + choice[round.split(" ").pop(2)])
)
```

```{ojs}
d3.sum(
  input1
    .split("\n")
    .map((round) => (score[round] ??= 0) + choice[round.split(" ").pop(2)])
)
```

```{ojs}
md`- `X` means you need to lose
- `Y` means you need to end the round in a draw
- `Z` means you need to win`
```

```{ojs}
move = ({
  "A X": "A Z",
  "A Y": "A X",
  "A Z": "A Y",
  "B X": "B X",
  "B Y": "B Y",
  "B Z": "B Z",
  "C X": "C Y",
  "C Y": "C Z",
  "C Z": "C X"
})
```

```{ojs}
d3.sum(
  input0
    .split("\n")
    .map(
      (need) => (score[move[need]] ??= 0) + choice[move[need].split(" ").pop(2)]
    )
)
```

```{ojs}
d3.sum(
  input1
    .split("\n")
    .map(
      (need) => (score[move[need]] ??= 0) + choice[move[need].split(" ").pop(2)]
    )
)
```
